Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx.trigger

package io.github.zero88.schedulerx.trigger
Provides the classes and interfaces to define the trigger and its scheduler.
Since:
2.0.0

    TriggerEvaluator
    Represents for the trigger evaluator to assess in 2 cases: if the trigger is can run before each execution round is started. if the trigger should stop executing immediately after one round of execution begins.
